column4: Hi I just downloaded a demo of the game cold war for linux and after the intro movie it crashes and gives me this error:check: OpenGL error 1285 detected: out of memory (GLuint meng::renderer::Stream::create_vbo_memory_block(const meng::renderer::stream_meta_data::StreamMetaData&, const meng::byte*)) (stream_memory_opengl.cpp:70)
yeah i have an ati radeon 9550 and i installed the correct drivers
how much ram do you have on the machine, and how much swap?
the config.txt file is for the game, not the graphics card.
